snippet.title: Magic 2014—Duels of the Planeswalkers Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Ignite your spark with Magic 2014—Duels of the Planeswalkers! With over 12 million fans, discover what makes Magic: The Gathering the world's premier trading card game. Become a Planeswalker and travel the planes of existence unleashing a torrent of spells and creatures to devastate your opponents.

There are a number of cool new things in Magic 2014 this time around, including:

Android: It will be available on Android tablet for the first time ever via Amazon App Store and Google Play. Magic 2014 will continue supporting XBox, Playstation, PC, and iPad as well.

New Sealed Play Mode: Open virtual Booster Packs of Magic cards to build decks and battle in single-player and multiplayer modes.

Ten New Decks: More decks to unlock and battle online with!

Plus More Encounters and More Challenges!
